content:
DomainMode Enum

Definition

Indicates the mode that a domain is operating in.

In this Article

public enum DomainMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DomainMode

Fields

Unknown

The domain mode is in an unknown state.
Windows2000MixedDomain

The domain is operating in Windows 2000 mixed mode.
Windows2000NativeDomain

The domain is operating in Windows 2000 native mode.
Windows2003Domain

The domain is operating in Windows Server 2003 mode.
Windows2003InterimDomain

The domain is operating in Windows Server 2003 domain-function mode.
Windows2008Domain

The domain is operating in Windows Server 2008 mode.
Windows2008R2Domain

The domain is operating in Windows Server 2008 R2 mode.
Windows2012R2Domain

[Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions] The domain is operating in Windows Server 2012 R2 mode.
Windows8Domain

The domain is operating in Windows 8 mode.
